        create a new process station and add it to the station list
        Parameters:
        label - of the station
        numberOfInQueues - the number of incoming queues
        numberOfOutQueues - the number of outgoing queues
        troughPut - a stations parameter that affects treatment of an object
        xPos - x position of the station
        yPos - y position of the station
        image - image of the station
